Package org.camunda.connect.httpclient

Interface HttpBaseRequest<Q extends HttpBaseRequest<?,?>,R extends ConnectorResponse>

All Superinterfaces:
ConnectorRequest<R>
All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
